ca.uwaterloo.epad.ui

Class SlidingDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.SMT.PGraphicsDelegate
      • vialab.SMT.Zone
        • ca.uwaterloo.epad.ui.Drawer
          • ca.uwaterloo.epad.ui.SlidingDrawer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, processing.core.PConstants

    public class SlidingDrawer
extends Drawer
    This class represents a square sliding drawer widget. The child items are organised by a RectangularContainer. Currently only TOP position is supported.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dmitry Pyryeskin
    See Also:
    RectangularContainer

    • Method Detail

      • makeTopDrawer

        public static SlidingDrawer makeTopDrawer(processing.core.PApplet parent,
                          int drawerDepth)
        Automatically make a sliding drawer on the top of the screen. Width of the drawer is equal to the width of the screen and depth of the drawer is equal to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent applet
        drawerDepth - depth of the drawer in pixels
        Returns:
        resulting SlidingDrawer instance

      • isItemAbove

        public boolean isItemAbove(vialab.SMT.Zone item)
        Description copied from class: Drawer
        Calculate whether or not the given item is above the drawer.
        Specified by:
        isItemAbove in class Drawer
        Parameters:
        item - a zone object to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the item is above the drawer and false otherwise
